Sentencas: Solid-oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are particularly attractive since they offer clean and efficient decentralized electricity generation and can be incorporated into hybrid systems with CHP capabilities.
Titulo: Detailed kinetic modelling of the T-POX reforming process using a reactor network approach

Sentencas: However, small scale SOFC systems operated with hydrocarbon fuels require external reforming.
Titulo: Detailed kinetic modelling of the T-POX reforming process using a reactor network approach

Sentencas: A very promising reforming technology involves partial oxidation (POX) in an inert porous material (T-POX reformer).
Titulo: Detailed kinetic modelling of the T-POX reforming process using a reactor network approach

Sentencas: The present work provides extensive numerical simulation of a prototype T-POX reformer operating with methane.
Titulo: Detailed kinetic modelling of the T-POX reforming process using a reactor network approach

Sentencas: Computations are performed using a reactor network approach incorporating full detailed chemistry and results are successfully compared against experimentally determined hydrocarbon species data.
Titulo: Detailed kinetic modelling of the T-POX reforming process using a reactor network approach

Sentencas: Computational results are further used to identify the elementary kinetic pathways for hydrocarbon fuel partial oxidation, molecular growth and pollutant formation as well as to identify optimum reformer operating conditions.
Titulo: Detailed kinetic modelling of the T-POX reforming process using a reactor network approach
